001package io.jstach.jstachio;
002
003import java.io.DataOutput;
004import java.io.IOException;
005import java.io.OutputStream;
006import java.nio.charset.Charset;
007
008/**
009 * Analogous to {@link Appendable} and {@link DataOutput}.
010 *
011 * @author agentgt
012 * @param <E> the exception type that can happen on output
013 */
014public interface Output<E extends Exception> {
015
016        /**
017         * Analogous to {@link Appendable#append(CharSequence)}.
018         * @param s unlike appendable always non null.
019         * @throws E if an error happens while writting to the appendable
020         * @apiNote Implementations are required to implement this method.
021         */
022        public void append(CharSequence s) throws E;
023
024        /**
025         * Analogous to {@link Appendable#append(CharSequence, int, int)}.
026         * @param csq Unlike appendable never null.
027         * @param start start inclusive
028         * @param end end exclusive
029         * @throws E if an error happens while writting to the appendable
030         * @apiNote Implementations are required to implement this method.
031         */
032        public void append(CharSequence csq, int start, int end) throws E;
033
034        /**
035         * Appends a character to an appendable.
036         * @param c character
037         * @throws E if an error happens while writting to the appendable
038         * @apiNote Implementations are required to implement this method.
039         */
040
041        public void append(char c) throws E;
042
043        /**
044         * Write a short by using {@link String#valueOf(int)}
045         * @param s short
046         * @throws E if an error happens while writting to the appendable
047         */
048        default void append(short s) throws E {
049                append(String.valueOf(s));
050        }
051
052        /**
053         * Write a int by using {@link String#valueOf(int)}.
054         * <p>
055         * Implementations should override if they want different behavior or able to support
056         * appendables that can write the native type.
057         * @param i int
058         * @throws E if an error happens while writting to the appendable
059         */
060        default void append(int i) throws E {
061                append(String.valueOf(i));
062        }
063
064        /**
065         * Write a long by using {@link String#valueOf(long)}.
066         * <p>
067         * Implementations should override if they want different behavior or able to support
068         * appendables that can write the native type.
069         * @param l long
070         * @throws E if an error happens while writting to the appendable
071         */
072        default void append(long l) throws E {
073                append(String.valueOf(l));
074        }
075
076        /**
077         * Write a long by using {@link String#valueOf(long)}.
078         * <p>
079         * Implementations should override if they want different behavior or able to support
080         * appendables that can write the native type.
081         * @param d double
082         * @throws E if an error happens while writting to the appendable
083         */
084        default void append(double d) throws E {
085                append(String.valueOf(d));
086        }
087
088        /**
089         * Write a long by using {@link String#valueOf(long)}.
090         * <p>
091         * Implementations should override if they want different behavior or able to support
092         * appendables that can write the native type.
093         * @param b boolean
094         * @throws E if an error happens while writting to the appendable
095         */
096        default void append(boolean b) throws E {
097                append(String.valueOf(b));
098        }
099
100        /**
101         * Adapts an {@link Appendable} as an {@link Output}.
102         * @param a the appendable to be wrapped.
103         * @param charset the encoding to use
104         * @return outputstream output
105         */
106        public static Output<IOException> of(OutputStream a, Charset charset) {
107                return new OutputStreamOutput(a, charset);
108        }
109
110        /**
111         * Adapts an {@link Appendable} as an {@link Output}.
112         * @param a the appendable to be wrapped.
113         * @return string based output
114         */
115        public static Output<IOException> of(Appendable a) {
116                return new AppendableOutput(a);
117        }
118
119        /**
120         * Adapts a {@link StringBuilder} as an {@link Output}.
121         * @param a the appendable to be wrapped.
122         * @return string based output
123         */
124        public static StringOutput of(StringBuilder a) {
125                return new StringOutput(a);
126        }
127
128        /**
129         * String Builder based output.
130         *
131         * @author agentgt
132         *
133         */
134        public class StringOutput implements Output<RuntimeException> {
135
136                private final StringBuilder buffer;
137
138                /**
139                 * Create using supplied StringBuilder.
140                 * @param buffer never null.
141                 */
142                public StringOutput(StringBuilder buffer) {
143                        super();
144                        this.buffer = buffer;
145                }
146
147                @Override
148                public void append(CharSequence s) {
149                        buffer.append(s);
150                }
151
152                @Override
153                public void append(CharSequence csq, int start, int end) {
154                        buffer.append(csq, start, end);
155
156                }
157
158                @Override
159                public void append(char c) {
160                        buffer.append(c);
161
162                }
163
164                @Override
165                public String toString() {
166                        return buffer.toString();
167                }
168
169                @Override
170                public void append(boolean b) throws RuntimeException {
171                        buffer.append(b);
172                }
173
174                @Override
175                public void append(double d) throws RuntimeException {
176                        buffer.append(d);
177                }
178
179                @Override
180                public void append(int i) throws RuntimeException {
181                        buffer.append(i);
182                }
183
184                @Override
185                public void append(long l) throws RuntimeException {
186                        buffer.append(l);
187                }
188
189                @Override
190                public void append(short s) throws RuntimeException {
191                        buffer.append(s);
192                }
193
194                /**
195                 * The buffer that has been wrapped.
196                 * @return the wrapped builder
197                 */
198                StringBuilder getBuffer() {
199                        return buffer;
200                }
201
202        }
203
204}
205
206class AppendableOutput implements Output<IOException> {
207
208        private final Appendable appendable;
209
210        public AppendableOutput(Appendable appendable) {
211                super();
212                this.appendable = appendable;
213        }
214
215        @Override
216        public void append(CharSequence s) throws IOException {
217                appendable.append(s);
218        }
219
220        @Override
221        public void append(CharSequence csq, int start, int end) throws IOException {
222                appendable.append(csq, start, end);
223
224        }
225
226        @Override
227        public void append(char c) throws IOException {
228                appendable.append(c);
229
230        }
231
232}
233
234class OutputStreamOutput implements Output<IOException> {
235
236        private final OutputStream outputStream;
237
238        private final Charset charset;
239
240        public OutputStreamOutput(OutputStream outputStream, Charset charset) {
241                super();
242                this.outputStream = outputStream;
243                this.charset = charset;
244        }
245
246        @Override
247        public void append(char c) throws IOException {
248                outputStream.write(("" + c).getBytes(this.charset));
249        }
250
251        @Override
252        public void append(CharSequence csq) throws IOException {
253                outputStream.write(csq.toString().getBytes(this.charset));
254        }
255
256        @Override
257        public void append(CharSequence csq, int start, int end) throws IOException {
258                outputStream.write(csq.subSequence(start, end).toString().getBytes(this.charset));
259        }
260
261}
